properties.description: If the pipeline is fail -> {send mail, log, ...}

activities.name: ETL-1-1-1-Lookup file_status is ER
activities.description: Get list file name with configId=$id and file_status='ER'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select a.file_name ,b.data_file_target_schema,b.data_file_target_table,b.container_dir,b.import_dir
,b.success_dir,b.error_dir, b.delimiter
from control.data_file a
left join control.data_file_configuration b on a.data_file_config_id = b.data_file_config_id 
where a.file_status in ('ER') and a.data_file_config_id =@{pipeline().parameters.configId}

activities.name: ETL-1-1-3-ForEach
activities.description: For loop list file from result lookup

activities.name: ETL-1-1-3-8 IF Check isExtractFail
activities.description: If isExtractFail = true => stop process extract file from file to ods on configId

ifFalseActivities.name: ETL-1-1-3-8-1 Copy file to temp table

dependsOn.activity: ETL-1-1-3-8-5 Update guid to temp table

ifFalseActivities.name: ETL-1-1-3-8-5 Update guid to temp table

dependsOn.activity: ETL-1-1-3-8-1 Copy file to temp table
ETL-1-1-3-8-1 Copy file to temp table
ETL-1-1-3-8-5 Update guid to temp table
ETL-1-1-3-8-1 Copy file to temp table

activities.name: ETL-1-1-6 Check To Merge Data
activities.description: if [Datetime] > [Datetime] Lastest Extract => start merge data from temp table to ODS

expression.value:
@and(and( not(variables('isExtractFail')) , greater(activity('ETL-1-1-1-Lookup file_status is ER').output.count, 0)),
equals(activity('ETL-1-1-4-Check current up to date').output.firstRow.Ncount, 0))

ifTrueActivities.name: ETL-1-1-6-1 Merge data from temp to ODS

dependsOn.activity: ETL-1-1-6-1 Merge data from temp to ODS

ifTrueActivities.name: ETL-1-1-6-4 Move Files To Done Folder
ETL-1-1-6-3 Refresh  status file to ER

dependsOn.activity: ETL-1-1-6-1 Merge data from temp to ODS

ifTrueActivities.name: ETL-1-1-6-5 Write log and send mail - merge data

dependsOn.activity: ETL-1-1-6-3 Refresh  status file to ER

parameters.ErrorMessage: Activity 'Merge data from temp to ODS' is Fail

activities.name: ETL-1-1-7 IF Count Of Current Date  Greater Than 0

ifTrueActivities.name: ETL-1-1-7-2 Execute Pipeline To Send Notification

dependsOn.activity: ETL-1-1-7-1 Refresh  status file to ER_crd_greater_0

parameters.ErrorMessage: The date time of current extract file is earlier than/equal  current_up_to

ifTrueActivities.name: ETL-1-1-7-1 Refresh  status file to ER_crd_greater_0
ETL-1-1-5-1 Refresh  status file to ER
ETL-1-1-5-2-Write log and send mail - extract fail

dependsOn.activity: ETL-1-1-5-1 Refresh  status file to ER

activities.name: ETL-1-1-8 Write log and send mail - current up to

parameters.ErrorMessage: Activity 'Check Current Up To With File Date Time' Fail

activities.name: ETL-1-1-9 Refresh  status file to ER

dependsOn.activity: ETL-1-1-8 Write log and send mail - current up to

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT data_file_config_id, data_file_config_name,
data_file_target_schema,data_file_target_table,
container_dir,import_dir,success_dir,error_dir
FROM  [CONTROL].[DATA_FILE_CONFIGURATION] where data_file_config_id in (@{pipeline().parameters.listConfigId})

activities.name: IS-2-1-3-1 Insert fileName to control data_file
MP-1-Insert new files to control data-file

dependsOn.activity: MP-1-Insert new files to control data-file

activities.name: MP-3-Sync data from ODS to STG
TR-1-2-Get lastest transfer and current executionLogId

expression.value: @greater(activity('TR-1-2-Get lastest transfer and current executionLogId').output.value[0].endExecutionId , activity('TR-1-2-Get lastest transfer and current executionLogId').output.value[0].startExecutionId)

ifFalseActivities.name: TR-1-3-1- Exit by no data has changed

dependsOn.activity: TR-1-3-1-Transfer data from ODS to STG
TR-1-3-1-Transfer data from ODS to STG

ifTrueActivities.name: TR-1-3-4- Set variable isTransferError to True

dependsOn.activity: TR-1-3-1-Transfer data from ODS to STG

ifTrueActivities.name: TR-1-3-1-Transfer data from ODS to STG

dependsOn.activity: TR-1-2-Get lastest transfer and current executionLogId
TR-1-2-Get lastest transfer and current executionLogId
TR-1-2-Get lastest transfer and current executionLogId

activities.name: TR-2-1- Got error in Sync data

ifFalseActivities.name: TR-2-2-2- No Data Transfer to TSG

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT a.process_id, b.concurrent_trans_name, b.start_execution_id, b.end_execution_id, b.is_complete,
REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING( b.concurrent_trans_name ,CHARINDEX('.',  b.concurrent_trans_name)+1 , LEN( b.concurrent_trans_name)), '[' ,''), ']','')+'Type' as table_type,
'[stg].[usp_transfer_Board_' + REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING( b.concurrent_trans_name ,CHARINDEX('.',  b.concurrent_trans_name)+1 , LEN( b.concurrent_trans_name)), '[' ,''), ']','')+']' as transfer_sp
FROM [control].[process] a
INNER JOIN [control].[process_concurrent_trans] b ON a.process_id = b.process_id
WHERE a.process_config_id = @{pipeline().parameters.processConfigId} AND a.process_status ='PR';
